creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red with white, black and yellow zigzag geometrics embroidered in chain stitch through green silk cloth and coarse, weft faced black cotton; one long edge overcast; tacked to black fabric along other long end, selvedge edges and both ends of embroidery; green silk fabric seamed in 2 pieces; black cotton fabric has a center seam
title: Collar
